about_the_game:
Background Setting:

In the unknown darkness, a sudden disaster swept through the once bustling city. A zombie virus quickly spread, devouring countless innocent lives. The former citizens have now transformed into bloodthirsty zombies, wandering the streets and alleyways, searching for their next victim. The entire city is shrouded in the shadow of death and fear, with only a handful of survivors hiding in the darkness, silently praying for rescue.

Protagonist Introduction:

In this desperate situation, there stands a soldier, alone at the last line of defense. He is a well-trained fighter, with a firm will and unyielding spirit. He knows that he shoulders the responsibility of protecting this last piece of pure land, and must do everything in his power to safeguard the survivors until the rescue plane arrives.

Game Description:

This game is a zombie-themed survival shooting game where you play as a brave soldier in this zombie-occupied city. You need to use your weapons and equipment to engage in a life-and-death struggle with the zombies. Every battle is full of thrills and excitement, and you must always be vigilant, finding suitable hiding places to avoid being discovered by zombies.

Besides fighting, you also need to search for food, water, and medicine in the ruins to survive. At the same time, you must keep an eye on the survivors' conditions, providing them with shelter and assistance. Forge deep friendships with them and spend this difficult time together.

In the game, you will face various challenges and choices. You can choose to forge ahead alone, bravely facing all difficulties; or you can choose to cooperate with other survivors to jointly resist the zombie invasion. No matter which path you choose, it will require tremendous effort and sacrifice.

However, no matter how difficult the road ahead may be, you cannot give up. Because you know that only by persevering can you wait for the arrival of the rescue plane. Only by persevering can you bring this city back to life.

The game will take you into a thrilling and challenging post-apocalyptic world. Here, you will experience the struggle and choices between life and death, feeling the glory and greatness of humanity. Come join us now and become the hero soldier defending the last piece of pure land!

content_descriptors.notes: Occasionally, violent or bloody scenes may appear when zombies are hit or killed in the game
